p: Late KS presentation with advanced disease on admission was a common feature in both the discharged patients and in those who died. However, those who died had a higher proportion of individuals with advanced disease than those who were discharged. This is similar to a study conducted in another sub-Saharan African country where a majority (69%) of AIDS-associated KS patients presented with advanced disease and had high mortality rates. [ 13] These findings suggest that presentation of KS in the early clinical stages are likely to improve outcomes.
